SEARCH
Package Engine

Class EntityHandler.ComponentMap

java.lang.Object
Engine.EntityHandler.ComponentMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
EntityHandler
protected class EntityHandler.ComponentMap extends Object implements Serializable
The ComponentMap class represents a map of components in the EntityHandler class. It stores the data in a HashMap where the keys are of type Short and the values are HashMaps with keys of type Byte and values of type Serializable.
See Also:
